4: Any experience in the restaurant industry
Must be alert and fast paced with a sense of urgency
Must be dependable, honest and motivated
Must have the ability to understand the needs of the guests
May be required to lift product up to 30lbs or more
Basic computer skills: Internet, Word, Excel...
5: Flexible schedule - ability to work some evenings required
Must be able to lift up to 40lbs
Good verbal communication and ability to take feedback from customers
Ability to listen, learn, take direction from leadership (even learning how to create a flower-shaped cone within 20 seconds!)
Ability to work quickly, consistently, and efficiently on the counter line
Commitment to good hygiene and professional appearance
Knowledge of food safety a plus
Past retail or client/customer service experience in a fast-paced environment and/or six months of customer service as a Barista
6: Superior customer service skills, preferably in the fitness industry.
Experience working as a Member Service Representative at Planet Fitness.
Solid supervisory, diplomacy and listening skills.
Must be 18 year of age or older
7: TEAMWORK and a GREAT attitude are required!
Must have flexible availability – Weekends & Holidays required
Ability to multi task and handle a high-volume venue
Be able to lift heavy buckets and trays
Initiative to help guests and team members
